Html:
Hi
I am a newbie here. I wanted to find out how to install and customise club starter kit from this site. Is there a tutorial written for this??
Cheers!
There is all kinds of docs here

How do I go about installing the starter kit in the first place? I have downloaded the Standard Version (VB) from http://www.codeplex.com/ClubStarterKit/Release/ProjectReleases.aspx?ReleaseId=4356
What to do with the zip file???
Unzip it, then open the solution.
